responses.question: How did you first hear about balenaCloud?
How would you describe your role?

answer.value: Using a Raspberry Pi as a Spotify connect server for my home stereo

responses.question: Could you briefly describe your use case?

answer.value: Great so far. Easy to set up. Occasionally, I have to restart it because it stops showing up on the network.

responses.question: How has your experience been so far? What can we improve? We count on your honest feedback to make balenaCloud better.
How likely are you to recommend balenaCloud to a friend or co-worker?
